## Code City Cycles Operational Analysis

This project examined multi-season operational trends for Code City Cycles using R Markdown. I analyzed revenue patterns, identified seasonal demand cycles, and created clear visualizations to help guide strategic decision-making. The final report includes professional tables, interpreted insights, and actionable recommendations to support efficient inventory and staffing decisions.

**Skills:** R Markdown, data visualization, seasonal analysis, business analytics, strategic reporting

## Marketing Research Survey Analysis

This applied marketing research project involved analyzing real survey data using Excel tools such as pivot tables, chi-square tests, and two-sample means testing. I explored relationships between demographics, preferences, and behavioural patterns to draw evidence-based conclusions and generate useful business insights. The project demonstrates my ability to extract and interpret meaningful patterns from large datasets.

**Skills:** Excel analytics, consumer insights, hypothesis testing, survey design, descriptive statistics
